body_html:
I'm going to merge this. The Linux CI has docker issues, but the Windows and Mac OS builds and tests succeed. The linux tests also succeed locally and in previous commits.

There's a perf regression in word_language_model.py (#5388). I think it's mostly in the setup, not in the actual training or evaluation.
body_text:
I'm going to merge this. The Linux CI has docker issues, but the Windows and Mac OS builds and tests succeed. The linux tests also succeed locally and in previous commits.
There's a perf regression in word_language_model.py (#5388). I think it's mostly in the setup, not in the actual training or evaluation.
body:
I'm going to merge this. The Linux CI has docker issues, but the Windows and Mac OS builds and tests succeed. The linux tests also succeed locally and in previous commits.

There's a perf regression in word_language_model.py (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5388). I think it's mostly in the setup, not in the actual training or evaluation.
